comments:
Sometimes starting a wtp wizard will not work. You may or may not get an error 
message. 
If you don't get an error message then you must cancel and call the wizard 
again, as continuing to select "Next" will do nothing.

I have the same Issue sometimes (even after reinstaling and only servers /JBoss/adding)I have two Exceptions in Error Log and wizards doesn't starts.

Only removing/changing workspace helps.

1)

Error 2005-12-07 12:41:47.734 Unhandled event loop exception
An exception stack trace is not available.
This Exceptions appears after menu - new - project - Dynamic/Ejb project.
Added to 1.5 Hot List at the request of Igor Shabalov, and priority set to P2.
Since the problem occurs for the New Dynamic Web Project wizard, I am moving this to the JST component
Can any interested parties provide a step-by-step reproducable scenerio so we can investigate?
Ilya, please provide detail information how to reproduce that error.

So, It's main problem. Because this bug I was able to see from 0.7 version and later. But it was appear after simple actions.. You can just create project.. and after that no one wizard will be able to run.. Sometimes no exceptions.., just nothing happens. If I'll be able to provide more information I'll do this as fast as possible, but for now I can't provide any more usefull.
Hi Kosta, assigning this to you, the exception is from the RuntimeBridge
Are you still able to reproduce this issue with the latest build? If so, please post a new stack trace. The one posted originally no longer lines up with anything useful.
No, I wasn't able to reproduce this bug since changing wtp.
Sounds like this has already been fixed.
Update 1.5 hot bugs to use the new hot bug process.

This bug is being moved to the "closed" state since because it has been in the fixed state for a long time it is being assumed fixed without explicit verification from the originator. If there is still a problem, in the most recent 1.5.x builds, please reopen or open another bug.
